statements: UPDATE research_projects SET project_description = 'Updated project description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', project_description = 'New Project Description' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_name='New Project Name' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE research_papers SET paper_title='Updated Paper Title' WHERE paper_id=1;
UPDATE research_projects SET lead_researcher='Jane Doe' WHERE project_id=2;
